name: Kikkerlicht_Demo
description:
A Small proof of concept demo i made for my master year in Game Design at Luca School of Arts in Genk.

This demo is mainly a proof of concept and showcase for the new VR workflow I explored during this masteryear. All art & assets were made in VR, in the apps: Quill and Gravity Sketch VR.

The Demo is also a small introduction into the small world of Kikkerlicht: An ecological fairy tale about frogs and the corruptions of wealth & technology
